name: Have A Grand Day!
description:
Have A Grand Day is a slap stick zombie survival that takes place during the onset of a zombie pandemic. Run. Shoot. And provide top notch customer service to your customers as you try to outlast waves of brain hungry un-dead.

This game is brought to you by the indie dev team Fruitful Pixels

Lead Programmer:  Pixel Jefe

Lead Artist:  Sensual Sanity

Sound Engineer: Alex Deluna

Music: Sensual Sanity
